content.value: NEW: A further 30 Black students are to receive a £20,000 per year scholarship to study at the University of Cambridge following a new partnership between Stormzy's #Merky Foundation & HSBC UK. The move represents a expansion of The Stormzy Scholarship programme, launched in '18.
